languages.text: "Интересное замечание, шерин. Значит ли это, меня вы тоже однажды {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}замените, как заржавевшую гайку{/d}? Или изношенный ботинок?" {n}Джай щурит глаза, и незнакомая отстраненность сквозит в ее взгляде.{/n} "Нет, не отвечайте! Сегодня я не желаю знать истины, останусь слепцом — так иногда мудрее".

traits.locale_text: "Интересное замечание, шерин. Значит ли это, меня вы тоже однажды замените, как заржавевшую гайку? Или изношенный ботинок?" {n}Джай щурит глаза, и незнакомая отстраненность сквозит во взгляде.{/n} "Нет, не отвечайте! Сегодня я не желаю знать истины, останусь слепцом — так иногда мудрее".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."
languages.original_text: "Интересное замечание, шерин. Значит ли это, меня вы тоже однажды {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}замените, как заржавевшую гайку{/d}? Или изношенный ботинок?" {n}Джай щурит глаза, и незнакомая отстраненность сквозит в ее взгляде.{/n} "Нет, не отвечайте! Сегодня я не желаю знать истины, останусь слепцом — так иногда мудрее".

Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「おもしろい感想ね、シャリーン。それは、いつかあんたが{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}あたしを誰かと取り換える{/d}ってことかしら？錆びた釘とか、すり減ったブーツみたいに？」{n}ジェイの目は細められており、その顔に浮かぶ曇った表情は見えない。{/n}「でもいいの、答えないで。今日は真実を知らなくてもいいわ。今日は盲目でいたい気分だから。それが一番賢明な道かもしれないし」
languages.original_text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."

traits.locale_text: 「おもしろい感想ね、シャリーン。それは、いつかあんたが{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}あたしを誰かと取り換える{/d}ってことかしら？錆びた釘とか、すり減ったブーツみたいに？」{n}ジェイの目は細められており、その顔に浮かぶ曇った表情は見えない。{/n}「でもいいの、答えないで。今日は真実を知らなくてもいいわ。今日は盲目でいたい気分だから。それが一番賢明な道かもしれないし」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “真是个有趣的结论，亲爱的。这是否意味着，有一天{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}我也会被替代，就像一根生锈的钉子一样{/d}？或者说，像一只破旧的靴子一样？”{n}婕伊眯起了眼睛，你无法辨认她脸上的表情意味着什么。{/n}“不，别回答这个问题！我现在不想知道真相，我宁愿被蒙在鼓里。有时候，这才是更明智的选择。”
languages.original_text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."

traits.locale_text: “真是个有趣的结论，亲爱的。这是否意味着，有一天我也会被替代，就像一根生锈的钉子一样？或者说，像一只破旧的靴子一样？”{n}婕伊眯起了眼睛，你无法辨认她脸上的表情意味着什么。{/n}“不，别回答这个问题！我现在不想知道真相，我宁愿被蒙在鼓里。有时候，这才是更明智的选择。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Una observación muy interesante, shereen. ¿Significa eso que algún día {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}me reemplazará, como si fuera un clavo oxidado{/d}? ¿O una bota maltrecha?». {n}Los ojos de Jae se entrecierran y no reconoces la expresión contrariada que aparece en su rostro.{/n} «¡No, no responda! Hoy no quiero saber la verdad. Prefiero la ignorancia; a veces es la opción más sabia».
languages.original_text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."

traits.locale_text: «Una observación muy interesante, shereen. ¿Significa eso que algún día me reemplazará, como si fuera un clavo oxidado? ¿O una bota maltrecha?». {n}Los ojos de Jae se entrecierran y no reconoces la expresión contrariada que aparece en su rostro.{/n} «¡No, no responda! Hoy no quiero saber la verdad. Prefiero la ignorancia; a veces es la opción más sabia».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est une remarque très intéressante, shereen. Est-ce que cela veut dire que moi aussi, vous {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}me remplacerez un jour, sans réfléchir, comme on change un clou rouillé{/d} ? Ou une vieille botte usée ? » {n}Le regard de Jae s'étrécit, formant une expression que vous n'avez jamais vue sur son visage.{/n} « Non, ne répondez pas. J'ai pas envie d'entendre la vérité, pas aujourd'hui. Je préfère rester dans l'expectative. Parfois, il vaut mieux. »
languages.original_text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une remarque très intéressante, shereen. Est-ce que cela veut dire que moi aussi, vous me remplacerez un jour, sans réfléchir, comme on change un clou rouillé ? Ou une vieille botte usée ? » {n}Le regard de Jae s'étrécit, formant une expression que vous n'avez jamais vue sur son visage.{/n} « Non, ne répondez pas. J'ai pas envie d'entendre la vérité, pas aujourd'hui. Je préfère rester dans l'expectative. Parfois, il vaut mieux. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Eine interessante Beobachtung, Shereen. Heißt das, Ihr werdet eines Tages auch {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}mich ersetzen wie einen rostigen Nagel{/d}? Oder wie einen abgetragenen Stiefel?" {n}Jaes Augen werden schmal, und diesen verschlossenen Ausdruck in ihrem Gesicht hast du noch nie gesehen.{/n} "Nein, antwortet nicht! Ich will die Wahrheit heute nicht wissen. Ich bleibe lieber blind – das ist manchmal der klügere Weg."
languages.original_text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."

traits.locale_text: "Eine interessante Beobachtung, Shereen. Heißt das, Ihr werdet eines Tages auch mich ersetzen wie einen rostigen Nagel? Oder wie einen abgetragenen Stiefel?" {n}Jaes Augen werden schmal, und diesen verschlossenen Ausdruck in ihrem Gesicht hast du noch nie gesehen.{/n} "Nein, antwortet nicht! Ich will die Wahrheit heute nicht wissen. Ich bleibe lieber blind – das ist manchmal der klügere Weg."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Enteresan bir düşünce şirinim. Bu, bir gün {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}benim yerime de biri gelecek demek mi? Paslı çivi gibi{/d}. Yırtık ayakkabı gibi..." {n}Jae gözlerini kısıyor. Yüzünde, daha önce hiç görmediğin bir ifade oluşuyor.{/n} "Sus, söyleme! Duymak istemiyorum. Kimi zaman bilmemek, en bilgece harekettir."
languages.original_text: "An interesting observation, shereen. Does that mean that one day you will {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}replace me, like a rusty nail{/d}? Or like a worn-out boot?" {n}Jae's eyes narrow and you do not recognise the shuttered expression that comes over her face.{/n} "No, don't answer! Today I don't want to know the truth. I'd rather stay blind — sometimes it's the wiser path."

traits.locale_text: "Enteresan bir düşünce şirinim. Bu, bir gün {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}benim yerime de mi biri gelecek demek oluyor? Paslı çivi gibi{/d}. Yırtık ayakkabı gibi..." {n}Jae, gözlerini kısıyor. Yüzünde, daha önce hiç görmediğin bir ifade var.{/n} "Yok, söyleme! Duymak istemiyorum. Kimi zaman bilmemek, en bilgece yoldur."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
